name: Old City Interactive
tagline: Washington, DC based custom web design firm
description: Old City Interactive is an interactive website design agency and online marketing firm headquartered in Washington, DC, and New York working projects all over the world! We are a full service award winning design company who creates beautiful websites and generates results! We specialize in small to medium sized business and are experts in web design, online marketing, and eCommerce website design.

locations.address: 601 Pennsylvania Ave. NW, South Building, Suite 900
